name: One Button To Rule Them All
name_original: One Button To Rule Them All
description:
Play the game by clicking the mouse anywhere on screen.

3 games, 3 characters... but just ONE BUTTON! The little girl jumps over the living obstacles - The superman-wannabe avoids the angry kittens - The lunatic is being chased by the lower-jaw monster... Survive as long as you can!!!

Made in Global Game Jam 2015
